40.ara-name: كتاب الإيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Mu'adh bin Jabal:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Do you know what Allah's right upon His slaves is?" I said: "Allah and His Messenger know best." He said: "His right upon them is that they worship Him alone and do not associate any partners with Him." He said: "And do you know what their right over Allah is if they do that?" I said: "Allah and His Messenger know best." He said: "That He will not punish them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي افْتِرَاقِ هَذِهِ الأُمَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Splitting That Will Occur In This Ummah
